mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (student_id, user_id, major_id, graduation_year) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{userId}, #{majorId}, #{graduationYear})
mapper.select: SELECT s.student_id AS studentId, u.name AS name, u.gender AS gender, m.name AS major, d.`name` AS department, s.graduation_year AS graduationYear, s.employment_status AS employmentStatus, j.title AS job_title, jt.name AS job_type FROM student_info s LEFT JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN major m ON s.major_id = m.id LEFT JOIN department d ON m.department_id = d.id LEFT JOIN employment e ON s.student_id = e.student_id LEFT JOIN job j ON e.job_id = j.job_id LEFT JOIN job_type jt ON j.type_id = jt.type_id where s.student_id = #{studentId}
